actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation

official_title: To provide an exemption with respect to gambling devices on certain vessels making voyages on Lake Michigan.

summary.text: Amends the Johnson Act to exempt a vessel whose voyage originates within the State of Indiana and does not leave Lake Michigan from the prohibition against possession or use of gambling equipment on vessels.

titles.title: To provide an exemption with respect to gambling devices on certain vessels making voyages on Lake Michigan.
